argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rrhf.d | |- D = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( B X. B ) ) |
| 2 |  | rrhf.j | |- J = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 3 |  | rrhf.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | rrhf.k | |- K = ( TopOpen ` R ) |
| 5 |  | rrhf.z | |- Z = ( ZMod ` R ) |
| 6 |  | rrhf.1 | |- ( ph -> R e. DivRing ) |
| 7 |  | rrhf.2 | |- ( ph -> R e. NrmRing ) |
| 8 |  | rrhf.3 | |- ( ph -> Z e. NrmMod ) |
| 9 |  | rrhf.4 | |- ( ph -> ( chr ` R ) = 0 ) |
| 10 |  | rrhf.5 | |- ( ph -> R e. CUnifSp ) |
| 11 |  | rrhf.6 | |- ( ph -> ( UnifSt ` R ) = ( metUnif ` D ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 13 | 1, 12, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 | #P_rrhcn | |- ( ph -> ( RRHom ` R ) e. ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) Cn K ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_uniretop | |- RR = U. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- U. K = U. K |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_cnf | |- ( ( RRHom ` R ) e. ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) Cn K ) -> ( RRHom ` R ) : RR --> U. K ) |
| 17 | 13, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( RRHom ` R ) : RR --> U. K ) |
| 18 |  | #P_nrgngp | |- ( R e. NrmRing -> R e. NrmGrp ) |
| 19 |  | #P_ngpxms | |- ( R e. NrmGrp -> R e. *MetSp ) |
| 20 | 7, 18, 19 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> R e. *MetSp ) |
| 21 |  | #P_xmstps | |- ( R e. *MetSp -> R e. TopSp ) |
| 22 | 3, 4 | #P_tpsuni | |- ( R e. TopSp -> B = U. K ) |
| 23 | 20, 21, 22 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> B = U. K ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_feq3d | |- ( ph -> ( ( RRHom ` R ) : RR --> B <-> ( RRHom ` R ) : RR --> U. K ) ) |
| 25 | 17, 24 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> ( RRHom ` R ) : RR --> B ) |
